availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William McGlone, Jr. (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Squire McGlone and Mary Ann Osborne McGlone. Married Susan O. Davis McGlone in Carter County, Kentucky, on October 31, 1861. Father of George McGlone and Mary McGlone. Resident of Carter County in 1850. Farmhand in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 231A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 158.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 2, p. 105A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Carter County Marriages, Film 001759301.
Robert E. McGlone and Thomas H. McGlone, The McGlones: A Series on the McGlone Name as Researched in the United States, (McGlone and Associates, 1980), p. 90-91.
